channel.title: Studio Mizutama Official Site
channel.description: Recent content on Studio Mizutama Official Site

item.title: Established a corporation
item.description: Studio Mizutama start activities as a general incorporated association in June 2021. We look forward to working with you for many years to come.

item.title: English subtitles available for With You episode 1
item.description: Added English subtitles to With You episode 1 Watch on Youtube.

item.title: Closed Kickstarter project for "With You"
item.description: Dear backers and all who supports us, We closed kickstarter project for With You. Unfortunatelly we were not able to achieve the goal though, we are still plannning to publish With You in the other format.

item.title: Our story starts!
item.description: We have released the first episode of With You! Watch in YouTube

item.title: See With You project on Kickstarter!
item.description: Our crowd funding is available on Kickstarter! The second episode of With You is leveraged by this. https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/studio-mizutama/kimi-to-issho-niwith-you

item.title: The official site has been launched!
item.description: We have launched the official site. Our latest activities are published here.

item.title: WITH YOU
item.description: Introduction With You / Kimi to Issho ni is a short independent animation movie launched from Japan. The anime illustrates young lovers' runaway, struggling between life or death.

item.title: MIZUTAMA PAINT
item.description: Mizutama Paint is open source storyboarding tool. Make it easy to build storyboard, set sequence, timing.
Skill JavaScript, TypeScript HTML, CSS Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Photoshop Clip Studio Paint Live2D
